experience: You and Amber both know Dimitri Ponomareff, Mark Castrovinci, and 46 others

In this episode of The New MORE Podcast, I had the pleasure of sitting down with  Stephanie Conner, Owner of Active Voice Communications, to discuss professional growth and how, as parents, moving forward in some areas of our lives can mean taking a step back in others. To grow or not to grow, that is the question. When less means MORE. Listen in. Share your thoughts.
MORE is where you go to grow your business and advance your career — without having to leave your family behind. The New MORE.

At Kayson, we help innovators, entrepreneurs, VC's and business owners gain insight into their operations, understand and anticipate the needs of their current and prospective customers, then thoughtfully develop and strategically bring to market new products and services (or evolve existing ones) to meet those needs. We specialize in helping business leaders see the big picture and connect the dots. Then, when it’s time to execute their plans, we also offer a team of professionals — including product managers, marketers, designers, analysts and more — who can put plans into action.
Technical Product Manager, Global Engagement Manager & Sr. Business Analyst

As the Global Engagement Manager I was accountable for the delivery of services between Apollo Global and Apollo Group's corporate technology departments.  Engagement oversight included data center management, service delivery, application design, development and deployment and contract management services.  Support extended to schools across the world including London, Chile, Brazil and India.As an Enterprise Technical Product Manager I was part of a team that oversaw the alignment of the business strategy and technical solutions for the organization's top 25 technology projects.  Scope of work included regulatory and revenue generating initiatives for Apollo Marketing, Apollo Business Operations and Apollo Global.As a Sr. Business Analyst for the organizations enterprise document management and business process management systems.  Responsible for capturing business requirements across the organization, implementing process improvements and partnering with the engineering teams on execution.

Working for Kirsten was both fun and productive.  She provided visionary leadership without interfering in the process, which enabled us to move ahead.  She is an excellent leader whos management style encourages independence & guarentees sucess.

summary: Wife. Mother. Founder. CEO. Business strategist and thought leader Amber Anderson is the founder of Kayson, a business strategy agency, and MORE, a community that helps working parents enjoy both family life and work.
name: Amber (Turner) Anderson
title: Founder, Kayson & MORE
